item.description:
Calling all ghouls, goblins and pups alike to come down and have a spine tingling great time as we celebrate Halloween Woof style at the Large & Medium dog Meet up!

So turn your pups into the scariest or even the cutest creatures! best costume will recieve a wonderful treat! Even parents can chime in on the Halloween Spirit!

Come join us October 25th as we host the best Monster Mash your pup will ever be a part of!


...Make sure to bring your updated vaccinations as well! (require rabies, bordatella, dhlpp and negative fecal)

Hope you See you There~!
item.name: Monster Mash Meet Up
